mapper.insert: INSERT INTO companyScrap (MEMBER_NO, companyName, scrap_time) VALUES (#{MEMBER_NO},#{companyName},SYSDATE)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM companyScrap WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{MEMBER_NO, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND COMPANYNAME=#{companyName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO InfScrap (MEMBER_NO, infoname, scrap_time) VALUES (#{MEMBER_NO},#{Infoname},SYSDATE)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM InfScrap WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{MEMBER_NO, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND infoname=#{Infoname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
